rule.name: AS_FS_BL_sortServiceRequestForDisplay
rule.description: Sort the service requests to display - active requests first and then by recent target completion date
rule.definition: a!localVariables( local!activeServiceRequests: #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_75720"( cdt: #"_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_271202"( cdt: ri!serviceRequests, field: "isOpen", value: false ), field: "dateField.value", ascending: true ), local!inActiveServiceRequests: #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_75720"( cdt: #"_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_271202"( cdt: ri!serviceRequests, field: "isOpen", value: true ), field: "dateField.value", ascending: true ), { local!activeServiceRequests, local!inActiveServiceRequests } )

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: { a!map( recordId: 19, recordUrl: "https://eng-test-fso-dev1.appiancloud.com/suite/sites/connected-servicing/page/servicing-requests/record/lMBjh2J12GqpY-QrjluVMD7sBlTISmUr6pCVBqGRVT3ejsB7K9dxUjfZp-Iox_DLTbBJCtfyN5D46BTHy7a0LxnV56PQnhTYmzv3UyIaS62VbXJ6w/view/summary", eventType: "SRQ", name: "PFF-SRQ-0001", statusLabel: "Active", serviceRequestType: "Customer Information Change", noOfAlerts: null, primaryOwner: a!map( 'ownerId': 21, 'serviceRequestId': 19, 'owner': "mason.ma", 'ownerGroup': 110, 'createdBy': "mason.ma", 'createdDatetime': fn!datetime(2021, 3, 23, 5, 45, 8, 0), 'modifiedBy': "mason.ma", 'modifiedDatetime': fn!datetime(2021, 3, 23, 5, 45, 8, 0), 'isDeleted': false ), isOpen: true, createdDateTime: fn!datetime(2021, 3, 23, 5, 45, 9, 0), dateField: { label: "Target Completion Date", value: fn!date(2021, 4, 6) } ), a!map( recordId: 20, recordUrl: "https://eng-test-fso-dev1.appiancloud.com/suite/sites/connected-servicing/page/servicing-requests/record/lMBjh2J12GqpY-QrjluVMD7sBlTISmUr6pCVBqGRVT3ejsB7K9dxUjfZp-Iox_DLTbBJCtfyN5D46BTHy3T0LwnKJ-uIYOI7kxfVXIoh1zLK3db3Q/view/summary", eventType: "SRQ", name: "PFF-SRQ-0002", statusLabel: "Active", serviceRequestType: "Customer Information Change", noOfAlerts: null, primaryOwner: a!map( 'ownerId': 22, 'serviceRequestId': 20, 'owner': "ishwaryaa", 'ownerGroup': 35, 'createdBy': "ishwaryaa", 'createdDatetime': fn!datetime(2021, 3, 23, 6, 2, 36, 0), 'modifiedBy': "ishwaryaa", 'modifiedDatetime': fn!datetime(2021, 3, 25, 10, 57, 14, 0), 'isDeleted': false ), isOpen: true, createdDateTime: fn!datetime(2021, 3, 23, 6, 2, 36, 0), dateField: { label: "Target Completion Date", value: fn!date(2021, 3, 24) } ) }
